app.title: Appendix A
app.p: Selected interview questions that resonate with the extracted themes

list-item.p: Please walk me through your day and talk to me about your prescription medications.

Prompts—if the patient did not talk about:
How many times per day do you take them?
How often do they take them?
Do you take them with food? Water?
Do you feel the medications are working well?
What do you dislike about them? For example, size, color, taste?
Can you tell me how you remember to take your medications?

Prompts—if the patient did not talk about:
Do you use pill box? Phone alarm?
Can you tell me the story of when you forgot to take medications and what did you do when you forgot? Anything you could remember about the experience.
Can you talk to me about your culture and if it is it OK to talk about HIV medications?
Can you tell me about your spiritual life, faith or religious practice that helped you go through this difficult period?
Can you tell me how you pay for your medications?
